resources.string: Allows the app to transfer your data via Bluetooth using the accessory framework
This application can access the wearable device connection status.
This will end your connection with %s.
Track and record your workout data automatically.
Important files deleted. Gear Manager files reinstalled.
The operating system on your phone has been modified in an unauthorised way, and is not compatible with the Samsung Gear app. Check your operating system and try again.
Deleting unused files from previous version...
Track your workout routes and get more accurate information.
Tap OK to install %s to enable the data transfer between your Gear and your phone.
"Do the passkeys on your phone and your Gear match? Then it's time to pair up."
Unable to open %s in Maximum power saving mode.
"If you've got a set of %s earbuds, take them out of the charging case and put them in your ears."

"Don't worry! First of all, check that your Gear is actually turned on.
If it is, go to Settings and select Reset Gear. It should then appear in the list of Gear devices."
Check if your phone is compatible and if the Samsung Gear app needs to be updated, then try again.

"The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.
Required permissions • Location: Used to search for nearby devices for Gear through Bluetooth • Storage: Used to transmit and receive the stored files with Gear • Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for updating apps and installing plug-in apps
Optional permissions • Contacts: Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Samsung account information"
Unable to use %s. Tap SETTINGS, then allow the following permissions and try again:
Bluetooth is turned off. Tap Turn on to turn it on.
Samsung Accessory Service has been updated. Restart your phone to connect to your Gear.
Pick the Gear that you want to connect to.
Set challenges and compare your step count with friends.
%1$s will remain on your device even after uninstalling %2$s.
Additional software (%s MB) could not be installed. There is not enough space in your device storage. Delete some files and try again.
Some of the scanned Gears cannot be connected to your phone. Tap UPDATE to update the %s app to the latest version, then try again.
A new version is available. Update the app to continue.
The %s app will close after the update has been downloaded. Reopen the app to complete the update.
%s needs to use network connections to work normally. Allow?
"Gear not found. Turn your Gear on and try again."
If your Gear is powered on properly but not shown here, go to Settings > Gear info, then select Reset Gear on the Gear to reset it to its factory default settings.
Some Gear watches can only connect to phones that have more than %1$s %2$s of memory.
Select the Gear to connect to.
Enhancing the smart wearable experience with Samsung Gear.
This app can determine your location and access your device storage.

"

It's okay!

Please,follow the steps below then your Gear will appear here

First of all, make sure your Gear is power on.

Second. If your Gear is powered on properly but not shown here, go to Settings> Gear info, then select Reset Gear on it. It helps Samsung Gear find your device instantly. Try it!

"
